global.title: UniNE Campus
global.calendarPermissionMsg: your app dosen't have permission to access the calender, please grante the access permission ot the calenader in order to save your events

mapPage.iosPositionError: To locate your location enable permission for the application in Settings - Privacy - Location
mapPage.androidPositionError: To locate your location enable permission for the application in Settings - Apps - Location

infos.intro: The UniNE Campus application is based on :

offline.header: Your device is not connected to the internet
offline.p1: This application relies on an internet connection to get data from our server. Please connect to mobile data or WiFi network to use it.

home.intro: Please enter the name of a person, organizational unit or telephone number.

search.title: Search
search.text: Search a person, organizational unit, phone number, building, aula, teaching room, computer room, etc.

event.title: Events, Courses, Professors
event.text: See the class/event schedules of the current week and add them to the calendar

map.title: Map
map.text:
Locate a collaborator, a building, an office, aula, classroom, computer room 
 (long press on local to see its type, the occupants, etc.
